weka.distributed

Class WekaScoringMapTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.distributed.WekaScoringMapTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class WekaScoringMapTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Map task for scoring data using a model that has been previously learned. Handles both classifiers and clusterers. Builds a mapping between incoming fields and those that the model expects. Degrades gracefully (via missing values) when model fields are missing from the incoming data or there are type mismatches.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11377 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:

        public void setModel(java.lang.Object model,
            Instances modelHeader,
            Instances dataHeader)
              throws DistributedWekaException
        Set the model to use
        Parameters:
        model - the model to use
        modelHeader - the header of the training data used to train the model
        dataHeader - the header of the incoming data
        Throws:
        DistributedWekaException - if more than 50% of the attributes expected by the model are missing or have a type mismatch with the incoming data

      • processInstanceBatchPredictor

        public double[][] processInstanceBatchPredictor(Instance inst)
                                         throws DistributedWekaException
        Process an instance. When the batch size is met then a batch of predictions is returned; returns null if the batch size has not been matched yet
        Parameters:
        inst - the instance to process
        Returns:
        a batch of predictions or null if we have not seen enough input instances to meet the batch size yet
        Throws:
        DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs
